long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Flout Translate translates the browser content into any language of your choice as you browse. No HANDS: it translates automatically & handles complex dynamic content, ensuring near real-time results. No buttons to press. READ WHILE LOCAL: Read everything in the browser in your language of choice. Even your searches are translated. Newspapers, magazines, everything. READ WHILE TRAVELLING: Check out all the local attractions, booking sites and news as you travel. Life on the road just got easier. LEARN A LANGUAGE: What a better way to learn. Check out all your local content in that language you are trying to master. PAY AS YOU GO CREDITS: Only pay for what you use, when you want to use it. No subscriptions you have to manage.
